title: Background colour of selected email in email list
creator: ian11
content: I would like to use Thunderbird instead of Gmail however I am finding the dark blue background colour used to show a selected email in the email list is really bad especially with the email subject and first 2 lines being black. Is the any way to change the colour? Thanks
metadata: ;os:Samsung Tab S10 Android;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/135.0.0.0 Safari/537.36;kb_visits_prior:["/en-US/kb/getting-started-thunderbird-android", "/en-US/kb/gmail-thunderbird-android"]

title: Thunderbird android sync 10 minutes
creator: harriskepix
content:
Hi team

Firstly, congratulations on the Thunderbird android app. Very good, easy to install and to sync with my account. The only issue, and please take a look about that, the minimum sync for the emails are 10 minutes (see attached photo) which is too high when you are expecting a new email. Please reduce the time into 1 minute and to have a notification for income email. Kind regards Charalampos Karampasis
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/136.0.0.0 Safari/537.36;os:to whom it may concern
